body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<root xmlns="http://example.com/default"
      xmlns:hr="http://example.com/hr"
      xmlns:it="http://example.com/it">
    <company name="TechCorp" location="New York">
        <hr:department id="D001" name="Human Resources">
            <hr:employee id="E1001" gender="female">
                <hr:name>Jane Doe</hr:name>
                <hr:position>HR Manager</hr:position>
                <hr:contact email="jane.doe@example.com" phone="123-456-7890"/>
            </hr:employee>
            <hr:employee id="E1002" gender="male">
                <hr:name>John Smith</hr:name>
                <hr:position>Recruiter</hr:position>
                <hr:contact email="john.smith@example.com" phone="123-456-7891"/>
            </hr:employee>
        </hr:department>
        <it:department id="D002" name="Information Technology">
            <it:employee id="E2001" gender="male">
                <it:name>Michael Chen</it:name>
                <it:position>Software Engineer</it:position>
                <it:skills>
                    <it:skill language="Java">Advanced</it:skill>
                    <it:skill language="Python">Intermediate</it:skill>
                </it:skills>
            </it:employee>
        </it:department>
    </company>
</root>
